about.name: Yashas Majmudar
about.title: Full Stack Developer & AI Engineer
about.summary: Full Stack Virtuoso wielding both frontend finesse and backend brilliance. Specializes in Flutter for cross-platform mobile development, Machine Learning & AI with Python and LangChain, and building scalable backend systems with FastAPI and Node.js. Passionate about crafting seamless digital experiences and engineering intelligent systems.
highlights: Cross-platform mobile development with Flutter
Machine Learning and AI with Python, LangChain, and LLMs
Backend development with FastAPI, Node.js, and Express.js
Cloud architecture with AWS and GCP
DevOps with Docker, Kubernetes, and GitHub Actions
Refactored legacy codebases, slashing crash rates by 40% and synthesized user analytics to orchestrate UX improvements, boosting engagement by 20%.

Implemented custom UI components to enhance user experience and align with modern design standards, focusing on clean
architecture, reusability, and scalability in Flutter development.
Engineered and launched a custom educational game using Flutter to enhance diagnostic skills in doctors, resulting in 40% increase in knowledge retention
Introduced analytics to track user performance, boosting training effectiveness by 25%
Led cross-platform app development using Flutter, boosting client base by 30% within six months
Architected APIs and databases with Node.js, Express.js, and SQL, improving processing efficiency by 40% and achieving 99.9% uptime
Designed a content management system, cutting update time by 50%
Integrated payments interface, increasing online sales by 15%
Achieved promotion within 8 months by driving significant organizational impact
Delivered app development projects for seven companies with 10K+ downloads and 4.3 star average rating
Integrated Firebase and Cloud Services, speeding up data retrieval by 40%
Implemented scalable ML models and games, increasing user retention by 25%
Implemented parallel downloading and file compression, reducing download time by 50%
Collaborated with UI/UX designers, leading to 30% increase in user engagement
Built secure APIs for authentication serving 1000+ daily active users
Developed game mechanics using Flutter Flame engine, increasing user engagement by 20%
Implemented encryption and secure authentication with less than 3% error rate
Created visually stunning graphics leading to 30% increase in positive reviews
Used GetX for state management, reducing development time by 20%
Developed B2C mobile app with Firebase, increasing user engagement by 40%
Implemented Hive caching, improving app performance by 30%
Transformed wireframe designs into functional code, increasing engagement by 15%
Integrated caching mechanism, reducing loading time by 20%
Developed RESTful search and create API, reducing development time by 30%
Developed WhatsApp auto responder app with 95% response rate
Integrated Firebase for real-time data, reducing response time by 50%
Optimized Android native services, reducing battery consumption by 30%
Implemented Room Database storage, reducing data retrieval time by 30%
Executed unit tests with JUnit achieving 95% test coverage
Developed web browser app with 100,000+ downloads and 4-star rating
Integrated offline storage with Room Database
Optimized threading, reducing app loading time by 50%

projects.name: Henchman
projects.description: An all-in-one interactive command-line tool for creating, setting up, and managing development projects.

projects.name: Illness Lab
projects.description: A virtual escape room game teaching medical residents disease detection, starting with diabetes. Combines interactive learning with problem-solving.

projects.name: MedTourism Co.
projects.description: A comprehensive medical tourism app with clinic search, community forums, health tracking, meal planning, and real-time support.

projects.name: DentaVacation
projects.description: Flutter app revolutionizing dental care with quizzes, videos, chat, habit tracker, cost calculator, and Docker-based forum. Achieved 40% increase in user engagement.

projects.name: Spotter: Find your Spot!
projects.description: Tailored spot suggestions with community engagement and local discounts. Increased user engagement by 40% using Firebase, Google Cloud, and BLoC.

projects.name: ASL Gesture Detection
projects.description: Machine Learning model that converts American Sign Language gestures to text using TensorFlow and MediaPipe.

projects.name: Direct Message
projects.description: Lets users send WhatsApp messages to unsaved numbers instantly.

projects.name: AngioNet
projects.description: A fully automated, reproducible pipeline for retinal vessel segmentation and vascular feature extraction using deep learning and graph-based analysis.

projects.name: AutoWhatsapp
projects.description: Android app automating WhatsApp replies for enhanced messaging efficiency.

projects.name: Smart Glass
projects.description: Low-cost efficient AR Smart Glass prototype using Arduino and C++.

highlights: Managed a team of 30 students
Successfully executed over 80 events

volunteering.organization: Google Developer Student Clubs, Indus University
highlights: Organized and led three educational events on Android development
Led teams of 3-5 students in intensive competition environments

publications.title: On-Screen Navigation with Hand Gestures using Computer Vision
publications.journal: IJSER (International Journal of Scientific & Engineering Research)
highlights: Developed computer vision-based hand gesture navigation with 95% accuracy
Reduced reliance on touchpad/mouse by 50%

publications.title: Image Segmentation and Deep Learning for Plant Disease Detection
publications.journal: Journal of Harbin Institute of Technology
highlights: Implemented advanced image segmentation (HSV, color correction, flood fill)
Trained CNN on 30,000+ leaf images achieving 97.95% validation accuracy
